devConfigurations.name: queries[0].fields
values: query DashboardFilters($tenantId: String!, $locationTypeAheadFilter: BooleanExp = {CONSTANT_VALUE: true}, $locationStateTypeAheadFilter: BooleanExp = {CONSTANT_VALUE: true}, $locationIdentifierTypeAheadFilter: BooleanExp = {CONSTANT_VALUE: true}$productTypeAheadFilter: BooleanExp = {CONSTANT_VALUE: true}) { LocationName: businessObjects(simpleFilter: {type: Location, tenantId: $tenantId}, advancedFilter: {AND: [$locationTypeAheadFilter, {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "locationType", type: STRING}, {VALUE: "PLANT", type: STRING}]}]}, hint: {viewId: "graph"}, cursorParams: {first: 50}) { totalCount pageInfo { hasNextPage } edges { cursor object { ... on Location { id, name: locationName } } } } LocationState: businessObjects(simpleFilter: {type: Location, tenantId: $tenantId, fieldNameForDistinctValues: "stateProvince"}, advancedFilter: {AND: [$locationStateTypeAheadFilter, {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "locationType", type: STRING}, {VALUE: "PLANT", type: STRING}]}]}, hint: {viewId: "graph"}, cursorParams: {first: 50}) { totalCount pageInfo { hasNextPage } edges { cursor object { ... on Location { id: stateProvince name: stateProvince } } } } LocationIdentifier: businessObjects(simpleFilter: {type: Location, tenantId: $tenantId, fieldNameForDistinctValues: "locationIdentifier"}, advancedFilter: {AND: [$locationIdentifierTypeAheadFilter, {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "locationType", type: STRING}, {VALUE: "PLANT", type: STRING}]}]}, hint: {viewId: "graph"}, cursorParams: {first: 50}) { totalCount pageInfo { hasNextPage } edges { cursor object { ... on Location { id: locationIdentifier name: locationIdentifier } } } }  ProductCategoryCode: businessObjects(simpleFilter: {type: Catalog, tenantId: $tenantId, fieldNameForDistinctValues: "code"}, advancedFilter: {AND: [$productTypeAheadFilter, {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "levelType", type: STRING}, {VALUE: "CATEGORY", type: STRING}]}]}, hint: {viewId: "graph"}, cursorParams: {first: 50, sort: {fieldPath: "code", order: ASC}}) { totalCount pageInfo { hasNextPage } edges { cursor object { ... on Catalog { id: code name: code } } } } ProductBrandCode: businessObjects(simpleFilter: {type: Catalog, tenantId: $tenantId, fieldNameForDistinctValues: "code"}, advancedFilter: {AND: [$productTypeAheadFilter, {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "levelType", type: STRING}, {VALUE: "BRAND", type: STRING}]}]}, hint: {viewId: "graph"}, cursorParams: {first: 50, sort: {fieldPath: "code", order: ASC}}) { totalCount pageInfo { hasNextPage } edges { cursor object { ... on Catalog { id: code name: code } } } } ProductLineCode: businessObjects(simpleFilter: {type: Catalog, tenantId: $tenantId, fieldNameForDistinctValues: "code"}, advancedFilter: {AND: [$productTypeAheadFilter, {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "levelType", type: STRING}, {VALUE: "LINE", type: STRING}]}]}, hint: {viewId: "graph"}, cursorParams: {first: 50, sort: {fieldPath: "code", order: ASC}}) { totalCount pageInfo { hasNextPage } edges { cursor object { ... on Catalog { id: code name: code } } } } }

devConfigurations.name: transformation
values: { "errors": "{{#? this.errors}}", "data": [ { "totalCount": "{{this.data.LocationName.totalCount}}", "results": { "{{#each this.data.LocationName.edges}}": { "id": "{{this.object.id}}", "name": "{{this.object.name}}" } } }, { "totalCount": "{{this.data.LocationState.totalCount}}", "results": { "{{#each this.data.LocationState.edges}}": { "id": "{{this.object.id}}", "name": "{{this.object.name}}" } } }, { "totalCount": "{{this.data.ProductCategoryCode.totalCount}}", "results": { "{{#each this.data.ProductCategoryCode.edges}}": { "id": "{{this.object.id}}", "name": "{{this.object.name}}" } } }, { "totalCount": "{{this.data.ProductBrandCode.totalCount}}", "results": { "{{#each this.data.ProductBrandCode.edges}}": { "id": "{{this.object.id}}", "name": "{{this.object.name}}" } } }, { "totalCount": "{{this.data.ProductLineCode.totalCount}}", "results": { "{{#each this.data.ProductLineCode.edges}}": { "id": "{{this.object.id}}", "name": "{{this.object.name}}" } } } , { "totalCount": "{{this.data.LocationIdentifier.totalCount}}", "results": { "{{#each this.data.LocationIdentifier.edges}}": { "id": "{{this.object.id}}", "name": "{{this.object.name}}" } } }] }
